黑冠椋鳥.en: (bird species of China) Brahminy starling (Sturnia pagodarum)

齋堂.en: dining hall in a Buddhist temple

龍泉驛.en: Longquanyi district of Chengdu city 成都市[Cheng2 du1 shi4], Sichuan

龍鬚糖.en: dragon's beard candy, a Chinese confection made from floured taffy pulled into flossy strands

鿍.en: hill, long and narrow highland, (used in place names)
